content: Lifestyle GOMO Mobile Plans Asked by WnkAsked on 29 Jul 2019Anyone using GOMO currently?Currently using the inaugural plan of Zero1 at $19, with 3GB to unlimited data at managed speed. Thinking if it is worth it to switch to GOMO at $20 a month?3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

JWjiajing wangLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 30 Jul 2019Well I am Using GoMo and I think the offside is when you want  travel, it is not worth to pump the value in for oversea data although you could get the  Gomo oversea Sim card but still I don't think it is worth. Other than  that, data speed is good but I don't monitor the speed and it is debited from your account to save you the hassleof paying bills..0 comments2

Randy ChaiLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 29 Jul 2019Not for me, but I'm on Singtel's Combo 3 plan, thinking of switching to a sim-only data plan in August. Btw, do check out all providers' reviews here: https://seedly.sg/reviews/telco-mobile-plans1 comment1
Wnk29 Jul 2019Thanks Randy! Wanted to seek more reviews as it seems like there are not many reviews on the link for GOMO :)
Serene TohLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 29 Jul 2019I was looking at it, but decided to go with Singtel's SIM only plan. $25.35 for just the basic package (5MB +10MB).0 comments0
